attributes.action: Provide free recyclable brown paper bags in place of plastic bags.
attributes.additional_details: there should be the option to carry goods in a less harmful to the economy and environment substitute; such as brown bags.  Customers wishing to carry heavier items can pay for stronger bags.
attributes.background: As many know, the UK passed a new legislation charging 5p for plastic bags. Undoubtedly, the effects of this will be absolutlely phenomenal on both the environment and economy. However, in terms of practicality...
